response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. It's not just an item; it's an investment in excellence and functionality tailored to meet your needs. Given its value and quality, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional product. I am confident that this price reflects its true value while also providing you with a reasonable opportunity to acquire it. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you.", "product_price": 9500}
